Hi, I'm Viviana! âœ¨
I'm an artist who loves creating cute and cozy art.
I mainly work with clay, but I also create acrylic and digital pieces. I'm currently learning 3D modeling and dreaming of making my own plushies one day!

Every piece is made with love, and I hope you enjoy exploring my work as much as I enjoy creating it. ðŸ’–

contact.text: I'm currently accepting custom commissions if they fit in my art style! âœ¨ whether you'd like to bring a personal idea to reality or have a piece featured in my collection. Feel free to reach out by email anytime.
